summary: This document consists of email correspondence primarily between Richard Kahn and Chad Markland regarding a financial transfer issue involving a bond. Kahn inquires about a transfer of bonds that did not occur as expected, while Markland confirms the status of the transfer request and offers assistance.

persons.name: Richard Kahn
persons.context: Richard Kahn is inquiring about a bond transfer issue and is associated with HBRK Associates Inc.

persons.name: Chad Markland
persons.context: Chad Markland is responding to Richard Kahn's inquiry about the bond transfer and provides updates on the status of the request.

persons.name: Jeanne Brennan
persons.context: Jeanne Brennan is copied on the email correspondence regarding the bond transfer issue.

connections.description: Richard Kahn is seeking assistance from Chad Markland regarding a financial transfer issue.
Jeanne Brennan is included in the email correspondence, indicating a professional connection.
Chad Markland is communicating with Richard Kahn and includes Jeanne Brennan in the correspondence, suggesting a professional network.

locations: 575 Lexington Avenue, 4th Floor, New York, NY 10022
keyFacts: Richard Kahn is inquiring about a bond transfer of 3,000,000 that did not occur as expected.
Chad Markland confirms that there are no issues with the DTC transfer request submitted on May 29, 2019.
There is a small amount of cash remaining in the account from interest that posted on the same day the wire of cash went out.
